response.original_title: 未亡人の性 男と女がいる限り…
response.overview: Goro, who works as a parcel delivery man, separates from his fiancee Mie and marries Yuriko, the wife of a Shinto shrine priest who died in the womb. Yuriko is a full decade older than Goro, and this is her third marriage. Then Katsuko, who works for a construction company that Goro is a client of, comes to live with him, relying on him... This highly exciting film, written by Oka Teruo and directed by Nitta Sakae, depicts the endless world of sexual pleasure between lust-starved women and a man with an insatiable sexual appetite. Yoshiyuki Yumi, Momoi Sakurako, Hayashi Yumika and others compete in extreme lustful ecstasy.
response.title: Widow Sex: As Long as There are Men and Women
